Steps to reproduce:

I open new mesage and i want to insert several recipients from address book bar (short cut F9) I select several recipients and i press add to To and add to copy. TB jump to empty place.



Actual results:

But it was empty edit field, in which i can write next recipient in preview versions. Now in last version of TB this edit field for writting next recipient discovered, when i begin to write next recipient.


Expected results:

I would like to be as preview versions. In preview versions it was that i press add to copy or to, edit field discovered very quickly and without problems. Can you repair very quickly?
Thank you for repairing problem in address book, where i can move up and down arrow in contact list and it is without problem.
